name: Connecting Objects
description:
Simply connect the same objects.

Play with mouse.

[Rules]

It is only possible to connect horizontally or vertically.

It is not possible to connect diagonally.

Connect more than 1 object to clear the objects off screen.

60 seconds each round.

[Bonus objects]

  +5 seconds

  Shuffle all

Just click on the bonus object to trigger the effect.

There will only be one bonus object on screen. Clear it, to get another by chance.
